alert.note: Alert for Pueblo (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 12 at 1:59PM MDT until June 12 at 3:00PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: The National Weather Service in Pueblo has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Pueblo County in southeastern Colorado... * Until 300 PM MDT. * At 159 PM MDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Pinon to 7 miles south of Pueblo Reservoir, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Pueblo, Boone, Pueblo Reservoir, Salt Creek, Blende, Avondale, Pueblo West, Pueblo Depot and Pinon. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
